p: The essential oil obtained from the roots is rather rich in oxygenated sesquiterpenes. These compounds represent between 37.23% and 66.39% of all the essential oil, and the main sesquiterpene compound is aristolone (18%–48%). Monoterpenes hydrocarbon is also present in large quantities, they represent 13–35% of all the essential oil, and the main compound is the limonene whose yield ranges between 9% and 30% (Table 3).
